powerButton.name: powerButton
powerButton.widgetStructure: let div = []; div[0] = document.createElement('div'); div[0] = ManageDiv.passed.css.addCode(div[0], 'background-image: url("powerRed.svg")', 'widgetsStyle'); div[0] = ManageDiv.passed.css.addCode(div[0], 'transition: 1s', 'widgetsStyle'); return div[0];
powerButton.jsSetup: console.log('powerButton created'); if(printerPowerStatus == 1){$/$replaceBackgroundImage$/$($powerRed, $powerGreen); return;} if(printerPowerStatus == 0){$/$replaceBackgroundImage$/$($powerGreen, $powerRed); return;}
powerButton.jsFunction: console.log('powerButton sz Hi'); if(printerPowerStatus == 1){printerPowerStatus = 0, $/$replaceBackgroundImage$/$($powerGreen, $powerRed); return;} if(printerPowerStatus == 0){printerPowerStatus = 1, $/$replaceBackgroundImage$/$($powerRed, $powerGreen); return;}

extruderTempreature.name: extruderTempreature
extruderTempreature.widgetStructure: let div = []; div[1] = document.createElement('img'); div[1].src = './extruderIcon.svg'; div[1].classList.add($/$addSize$/$(1, 1)); div[0] = document.createElement('div'); div[0] = ManageDiv.passed.css.addCode(div[0], 'background-color: white', 'widgetsStyle'); div[0] = ManageDiv.passed.css.addCode(div[0], 'display: flex', 'widgetsStyle'); div[0] = ManageDiv.passed.css.addCode(div[0], 'flex-wrap: wrap', 'widgetsStyle'); div[0] = ManageDiv.passed.css.addCode(div[0], 'border-radius: 10px', 'widgetsStyle'); div[0] = ManageDiv.passed.css.addCode(div[0], 'justify-content: space-between', 'widgetsStyle');
